remarks: Range of a constant function in map to notation.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
rnmptc.f $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> B ) $.
rnmptc.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. C ) $.
rnmptc.a $e |- ( ph -> A =/= (/) ) $.
rnmptc $p |- ( ph -> ran F = { B } ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d C x $.
$d ph x $.
